values.name: None
values.description: Do nothing.

values.name: Kick
values.description:
A simple kick.
A basic medium-damage attack, with a 1:2 damage to cost ratio.

values.name: Hitstun
values.description: Stun from being kicked.

values.blockMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} but {target} blocks it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} swiftly kicks {target} for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to kick {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to kick {target} but falls on the ground and loses {-hpValue} {hp.ext_full}.

values.name: Jab
values.description:
A quick punch.
An easy low-damage attack, with a low chance of countering.

values.name: Hitstun
values.description: Stun from being punched.

values.blockMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} but {target} blocks it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} swiftly jabs {target} for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A headshot!
{sender} attempts to jab {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Sword
values.description:
Slash with a sword.
A strong weapon with high {st.ext_full} costs but a slightly better damage
to cost ratio (1:2), and a small chance to deal a critical,
potentially one-shot blow.
values.moveMessage: {sender} strikes {target} with a sword for {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Bleeding
values.description: Bleeding from a sword wound.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a sword for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword but {target} blocks it, taking only {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword and {target} fails to block, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword but {target} dodges it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} attempts to strike {target} with a sword and {target} fails to dodge, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and critically strikes {target} with a sword for {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
Too slow!
{sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and critically strikes {target} with a sword for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and bypasses {target}'s block with a sword, critically striking them for {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} pulls a Kingdom Come Deliverance and predicts {target}'s dodge, critically striking them for {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to strike {target} with a sword but falls on the ground and hits themselves for {-hpValue} damage.

values.name: Fire Ball
values.description:
Summon a fireball.
A standard, medium-damage attack that costs {mp.ext_full}.
values.moveMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} for {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Fire
values.description: You're on fire!

values.fastMessage: {sender} shoots a FAST ball of fire at {target} for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} but {target} blocks it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots a ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} shoots a DEADLY ball of fire at {target} for {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a FAST AND DEADLY ball of fire at {target} for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a DEADLY ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a DEADLY ball of fire at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot a ball of fire but it explodes in their face for {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Slam
values.description:
Slam down on your foe.
A move with high variability in damage output but with luck,
offers 25 damage at 40 {st.ext_full} cost instead of 50 (1:2 ratio).
values.moveMessage: {sender} jumps above {target} and slams down for {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Hitstun
values.description: Stun from being slammed on.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly jumps above {target} and slams down for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} but {target} blocks it, taking only {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} but {target} dodges it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to dodge it, taking {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} slams down on {target} for {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly slams down on {target} for {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to block it, taking {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} and {target} fails to dodge it, taking {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to slam down on {target} but hits the ground, losing {-hpValue} {hp.ext_full}!

values.name: Knife
values.description:
Slash with a knife.
A medium-damage weapon that is dangerous to counter, and has a
relatively high critical chance.
values.moveMessage: {sender} slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Bleeding
values.description: Bleeding from a knife wound.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries slashing {target} with a knife but {target} blocks, dealing only {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries slashing {target} with a knife but {target} dodged it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to dodge, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} swiftly slashes {target} with a knife, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} slashes {target} with a knife and {target} failed to dodge, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries slashing {target} with a knife but hits themself, dealing {-hpValue} damage.

values.name: Throw Knife
values.description:
Throw a knife.
A medium-damage weapon, boasting a high critical chance,
but requires you to dispose a knife.
It is harder to block than to evade, but failing evasion is worse.
values.moveMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Bleeding
values.description: Bleeding from a knife wound.

values.fastMessage: {sender} swiftly throws a knife at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} who is blocking, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} throws a knife at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} swiftly throws a knife at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} throws a knife at {target} and {target} failed to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to throw a knife at {target} but hits themself, dealing {-hpValue} damage.

values.name: Longbow
values.description:
Fire an arrow with a longbow.
A medium-damage weapon that requires a lot of {st.ext_full}, but will deal
moderate {st.ext_full} damage.
values.moveMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!

values.name: Bleeding
values.description: Bleeding from an arrow wound.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly shoots an arrow at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} but {target} blocks it, only dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots an arrow at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} critically strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} critically and swiftly strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to block and {sender} critically strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to evade and {sender} critically strikes {target} with an arrow, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot an arrow at {target} but hits themself, losing {-hpValue} {hp.ext_full} and {-stValue - stCost} {st.ext_full}.

values.name: Equilibrium
values.description:
Convert 25 {hp.ext_full} into magicka- {mp.ext_full}.
This move is uncounterable; the opponent cannot stop this process.
there is a 1/10 chance of failing, which takes away both {hp.ext_full}
and {mp.ext_full}.
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries using Equilibrium but it backfires, making {sender} lose {-hpValue - hpCost} {hp.ext_full} and {-mpValue} {mp.ext_full}.

values.name: Bobomb
values.description:
Throw a bob-omb.
A bob-omb is hefty to throw, but is powerful and hard to evade.
values.moveMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes, dealing {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Hitstun
values.description: Stun from a bob-omb explosion.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} but {target} blocks, dealing only {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes right next to them, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly throws a bob-omb at {target} and it explodes right next to them, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb right next to {target} and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} throws a bob-omb right next to {target} and {target} fails to evade, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to throw a bob-omb at {target} but the bob-omb explodes next to {sender}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Yeet
values.description:
Yeet your opponent.
A high-damage attack that puts the target in severe hitstun, but requires nearly all {st.ext_full} and {mp.ext_full} to execute.

values.name: Severe Hitstun
values.description: Stun from being yeeted.
values.noMove: {self} cannot move due to severe hitstun!
values.noCounter: {self} cannot counter due to severe hitstun!

values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to yeet {target} but {target} blocks, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} fails to block and {sender} yeets {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to yeet {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender} and {sender} yeets {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage:
A critical!
{sender} SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage:
A critical
{sender} quickly SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{target} fails to block and {sender} SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage:
A critical!
{target} fails to evade {sender} and {sender} SUPER yeets {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to yeet {target} but fails, losing {-hpValue} {hp.ext_full}.

values.name: Test Main
values.moveMessage: {sender} ran {move}, dealing {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP to {target}. It costed {sender} {-hpCost} HP, {-stCost} ST, and {-mpCost} MP.
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} ran {move} and {target} failed to block, taking {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP.
values.evadeMessage: {sender} ran {move} and {target} evaded it, using {-mpValue} MP.

values.name: Test Fast
values.fastMessage: {sender} ran {move}, dealing {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP to {target}. It costed {sender} {-hpCost} HP, {-stCost} ST, and {-mpCost} MP.

values.name: Test Fail
values.failureMessage: {sender} ran {move} and took {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP.

values.name: Test Critical
values.criticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a critical after no counter, dealing {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP to {target}.
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a fast critical, dealing {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP to {target}.
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a critical after a failed block, dealing {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP to {target}.
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} ran {move} and got a critical after a failed evade, dealing {-hpValue} HP, {-stValue} ST, and {-mpValue} MP to {target}.
